title: BRIEF-India's Bharti Airtel Resumes Postpaid Mobile Services In Jammu And Kashmir State
text:
BRIEF-India's Bharti Airtel Resumes Postpaid Mobile Services In Jammu And Kashmir State

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 14:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Bharti Airtel Resumes Postpaid Mobile Services In Jammu And Kashmir State Oct 15 (Reuters) - Bharti Airtel Ltd : * WAIVING OFF POSTPAID PLAN RENTAL CHARGES ‍FOR SERVICE SUSPENSION PHASE, FOR AIRTEL THANKS CUSTOMERS​ IN J&K * AIRTEL HAS RESUMED POSTPAID MOBILE SERVICES IN JAMMU & KASHMIR * RENTAL WAIVER FOR AIRTEL THANKS CUSTOMERS; ELIGIBLE CUSTOMERS WILL BE DULY NOTIFIED Further company coverage: BRTI.NS

BRIEF-India's Bharti Airtel Resumes Postpaid Mobile Services In Jammu And Kashmir State
description: BRIEF-India's Bharti Airtel Resumes Postpaid Mobile Services In Jammu And Kashmir State
